stem: Complications of systemic hypertension include all of the following EXCEPT
opt4: Nephrosclerosis leading to proteinuria and renal damage
disc:
Renal artery stenosis is a major cause (10%) of renovascular hypertension. It is also a predisposing factor for renal impairment and end-stage renal disease.

All other options are recognized complications of long-standing uncontrolled hypertension.
